column4: Err, anyone know how to dual boot ubuntu with XP? Not being able to get onto ubuntu without disk.
Nothing, just auto boots into windows.
I've installed it back on ubuntu, still boots into windows..
is your BIOS preventing you from writing to the MBR?
what's the device name of your disk?
perhaps GRUB is being written to /dev/sdb when your BIOS boots from /dev/sda?
I'm suppose to write grub onto sda?
I'm suppose to put grub onto sda? And not sdb?
